entry.title: Hershey's Kisses Vampire Filled with Strawberry Creme - 9oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 9.99

⚠️ Caution ⚠️: Deliciousness Ahead

     Nothing is better than stumbling across a bowl full of Hershey's Kisses, just be careful, these ones have fangs! One bite and you'll feel a strange bloodlust take over your tastebuds, they're craving the sweet Strawberry creme that fills each of these tasty treats.

     One Kiss, ah ah ah! Two Kisses, ah ah ah! You won't be able to stop yourself from reaching for number three, ah ah ah! Just keep these away from mom, she might just faint thinking her kids really turned into bloodsucking vampires!

9oz / 255g | 1 bag

entry.title: Whozeewhatzit - 48g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.49

A Bar So Good, They Didn't Know What to Call It!

     This is the chocolate bar that appears in your dreams, peanut butter lovers. A layer of creamy peanut butter on a bed of crispy chocolatey bits, all enveloped in a rich and smooth milk chocolate - it's absolutely hard to resist!

     Fun Fact: This bar was named the Whozeewhatzit by Hershey candy super-fan Lisa M. Kudos to Lisa for an unforgettable name!

entry.title: PayDay Candy Bar King Size - 96 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.99

PayDay Peanut Caramel Candy Bar

American Candy

Give your tastebuds the PayDay they deserve with the mouthwatering PayDay King Size Candy Bar!
This candy bar may be old fashioned, but wow! It just hits the spot every time! Filled with thick and nougat-like caramel,  then completely covered in a generous helping of roasted, crunchy peanuts that are lightly salted. These two flavours make some serious magic together!
Since 1932, the PayDay candy bar has been feeding our sweet and salty cravings. For a unique and delicious candy bar, only PayDay will do!

96 g Candy Bar

entry.title: Hershey's with Reese's Pieces - 115 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.49

Two Iconic Candy Brands!

If you’re craving a combination of Hershey’s Milk Chocolate and Reese’s Pieces, look no further. We have the perfect treat for you in Hershey’s with Reese’s Pieces. This innovative 2-in-1 bar from Hershey’s brings you the best of smooth and crunchy textures, together with delectable chocolate and peanut-butter flavours.

This chocolate bar is filled to the brim with Mini Reese’s Pieces candy and chopped peanuts, for a fantastic crunch. You’ll love this candy bar for a pick-me-up snack during those long afternoons. Hershey’s with Reese’s Pieces chocolate bar combines all the best of creamy milk chocolate and crunchy peanut-butter pieces.

115 g

entry.title: Hershey's with Skor Pieces - 90 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.49

HERSHEY’S Milk Chocolate

Almond Stuffed with SKOR bar

Gorgeously smooth classic Hershey’s chocolate mixed with the taste of crunchy Skor bars is what you’ll experience with Hershey’s with Skor Pieces. Skor toffee bits and chopped almonds await within the best of Hershey’s milk chocolate.

Hershey’s has been making chocolate since 1894, so you know you’re in for a decadent experience. Skor pieces are famous for their crunchy butter toffee coated in milk chocolate, and you’ll find this flavour and experience in abundance in Hershey’s with Skor Pieces.

Looking for a treat but can’t decide whether you want a classic milk chocolate bar or the distinctive taste of Skor? This chocolate bar combines both classic flavours into one tempting bar.

90 g

entry.title: Hershey's Miniatures Chocolate Assortment Candy - 5.3 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.29

Hershey's Classic Mini Bars

A very sweet assortment of Hershey's classic chocolate treats including Hershey's Milk Chocolate Bars, Hershey's Special Dark,  Mr. Goodbars, and Krackel Bars. 

  • Individually Wrapped
  • Kosher

5.3 oz

Ingredients: 

Sugar, chocolate, cocoa butter, milk peanuts, nonfat milk, crisped rice, contains 2% or less of: milk fat, lactose, cocoa processed with alkali, soya lecithin and PGPR, like emulsifiers, salt, malt and vanillin, an artificial flavouring.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to produce labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.
